title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety      USE THE SIDEWALK Please use the sidewalk at the south end of the parking lot to walk to the site.  There is a "green" pathway from the parking lot to the front entrance. However, the crosswalk at Monroe Street is not controlled. For more information on the "green" pathway, please click here.   FIRE AND SEVERE WEATHER SAFETY Brown v. Board of Education NHS practices regular fire drills year-round and severe weather drills from March through October.  Please be aware that you may be asked to help us practice our evacuation skills.
